mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETBBS (MEET_SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, SDATE, EDATE, MEMCNT, DEL, LOCATION, IMG) VALUES(MEET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ' ', #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{sdate}, #{edate}, 1, 0, #{location}, ' ')
mapper.select: SELECT MEET_SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, SDATE, EDATE, MEMCNT, DEL, LOCATION, IMG FROM MEETBBS ORDER BY SDATE ASC
